resources.string: This app is intended for Android Wear, you need an Android Wear smartwatch if you want to use it.\n\nRealized by Leonardo Gandini, drawings and original design by Roberta Pagnoni

This app is 100\% free and it will remain so!
If you want to support our work however, you can click the donate button to remove ads, a simple and really inexpensive way to say thanks for our work.

Whatever you decide\.\.\. enjoy you new watch faces!
